title: Table Centerpiece, ""Crystal Cypress Tree"", 1961
provenance: Purchased from Tiffany and Co., New York, NY, by Mr. and Mrs. James H. Ripley, 3/20/61.
dimensions: H x diam. (height of tree; dia. of cloth): 34.5 x 52 cm (13 9/16 x 20 1/2 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Ripley
description: Table centerpiece consisting of 32 glass components and 1 silk undecloth forming a garden with tree in center surrounded by shrubs, figures, and architectural elements.

tombstone.epitaph:
Table Centerpiece, ""Crystal Cypress Tree"", 1961.
1961. Glass, silk. Gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Ripley. 1962-150-1/7.
